document.full_text: christie vilsack, the wife of agriculture secretary tom vilsack, said on wednesday she is preparing a run for the iowa congressional seat of republican and tea party favorite steve king.
document.title: tom vilsack's wife mulling run for congress in iowa
lines_and_colors: christie vilsack, the wife of agriculture secretary tom vilsack, said on wednesday she is preparing a run for the iowa congressional seat of republican and tea party favorite steve king.
